description.narrative: 1. OVERALL OBJECTIVE: To improve public health and to create favourable climate for socio-economic development at four District Centres of Mafeteng, Mohale's Hoek, Mokhotlong and Quithing. 2. SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES: To augment the capacity of water source works, treatment plants, transmission mains, and storage facilities and extend the water distribution network to meet the water needs of the communities in the 4 district centres upto year 2000.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

sector.narrative: Water sector policy and administrative management

description.narrative: Water supply and Sanitation - policy, planning and administration
